title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Retail Sales Inquiry) Order
text_raw: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Retail Sales Inquiry) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (retail sale inquiry) order

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: (2) This Order shall cease to have effect on 30 April 2024.
text_raw:
2023. 

(2) This Order shall cease to have effect on 30 April 2024.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“inquiry” means the Retail Sales Inquiry that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation in so 
far as it relates to Annex C thereto; 
“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 1165/98 of 19 May 19981, as 
amended by Regulation (EC) No. 1158/2005 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 6 July 20052, Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 1503/2006 of 28 September 20064, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 1178/2008 of 28 November 20085, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 329/2009 of 22 April 20096, Regulation (EC) No. 
596/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 20097 and 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 461/2012 of 31 May 20128. 

1 OJ No. L 162, 5.6.1998, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 191, 22.7.2005, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 281, 12.10.2006, p. 15 
5 OJ No. L 319, 29.11.2008, p. 16 
6 OJ No. L 103, 23.4.2009, p. 3 
7 OJ No. L 188, 18.7.2009, p. 14 
8 OJ No. L 142, 1.6.2012, p. 26 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th October, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [510] 3 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified 
for statistical purposes under division 47 or 45 or class 56.30 of NACE Rev. 2 
set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No.1893/2006 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 11 March 20089, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 201210, and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 2019.11

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies 
to provide, for the purposes of the inquiry, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, once only in relation to the months of 
October 2023, November 2023 and December 2023, is hereby prescribed. 

9 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
10 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
11 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [510]

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned, and specifying the month to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the total value, including VAT, of retail sales; 

the total value, including VAT, of retail sales where the sales 
were via the internet; 

the number of outlets through which the retail sales referred to 
in subparagraph (a) were made.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates person undertaking concerned specifying month information relates (a) (b) (c) total value including vat retail sale total value including vat retail sale sale via internet number outlet retail sale referred subparagraph (a) made

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and, other than in
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 October, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
